mapper.insert: INSERT INTO km_checkin_record ( checkin_item_id, username, checkin_time, cycle_key, rec_creator, rec_create_time, rec_revisor, rec_revise_time, arch_flag ) VALUES ( #{checkinItemId}, #{username}, #{checkinTime}, #{cycleKey}, #{recCreator}, NOW(), #{recRevisor}, NOW(), 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM km_checkin_record WHERE id = #{id} AND arch_flag = 0
SELECT * FROM km_checkin_record WHERE username = #{userId} AND arch_flag = 0 ORDER BY checkin_time DESC
SELECT * FROM km_checkin_record WHERE checkin_item_id = #{checkinItemId} AND arch_flag = 0 ORDER BY checkin_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE km_checkin_record SET arch_flag = 1, rec_revisor = #{revisor}, rec_revise_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
